top_categories.workout_context: Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash's UK Yorkshire coast, British gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 45 miles.
67ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before June.
At Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Varied gradients on uK Yorkshire coast gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash. Train it until it feels boring.
When someone attacks on uK Yorkshire coast gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Low-cadence force work for 3,000ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on uK Yorkshire coast gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Smooth pedaling at 45 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.
45 miles on uK Yorkshire coast gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash’s 45 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Yorkshire Coast Dirt Dash requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on uk yorkshire coast gravel to build confidence. Expect: uk yorkshire coast, british gravel, uk.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, TT Threshold, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 45 miles of uk yorkshire coast gravel in Whitby, UK.
